T02TD1371E:223a-1: tri dzo gi hri da by'a k'a sha n'a ma /
T02TD1371E:223a-3: rnal 'byor gsum gyi snying po gsal ba zhes bya ba /
T02TD1371E:223a-5: aom gyis snang ba lam du nges //
T02TD1371E:223a-6: rdo rje sems la phyag 'tshal nas //
T02TD1371E:223a-7: sbyangs pa rab tu gyur pa'i lam //
T02TD1371E:223a-8: phyag rgya chen po bsgom par bshad //
T02TD1371E:223a-9: dbang gis smin byas dam tshig ldan //
T02TD1371E:223a-10: de la rnal 'byor gsum bstan te //
T02TD1371E:223a-11: gzhan la nam yang ma yin no //
T02TD1371E:223a-12: byin gyis brlab dang rtog pa bsgom //
T02TD1371E:223a-13: rang bzhin rnal 'byor gsum du nges //
T02TD1371E:223a-14: 'chi ba'i rtags nyid shes byas nas //
T02TD1371E:223a-15: srog gi thig ler nges par gzhug //
T02TD1371E:223a-16: so sor sdud dang bsam gtan dang //
T02TD1371E:223a-17: srog rtsol de bzhin 'dzin pa dang //
T02TD1371E:223a-18: rjes su dran dang ting nge 'dzin //
T02TD1371E:223a-19: rnal 'byor yan lag drug ces bya //
T02TD1371E:223a-20: mtshan mo gseng med khyim du ni //
T02TD1371E:223a-21: shin tu mnyam gzhag sgrub pa pos //
T02TD1371E:223a-22: byed pa lnga la bcing ba gnyis //
T02TD1371E:223a-23: bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya //
T02TD1371E:223a-24: yod dang med pa las 'das pa'i //
T02TD1371E:223a-25: du ba smig rgyu srin me khyer //
T02TD1371E:223a-26: mar me sems kyis nam mkhar mthong //
T02TD1371E:223a-27: gzhon nu ma yis snga las ni //
T02TD1371E:223a-28: lkog tu gyur pa'i rkun ma mthong //
T02TD1371E:223a-29: nyi tshe ba yi mig gis ni //
T02TD1371E:223a-30: sgrub pa po yi song nas mthong //
T02TD1371E:223b-0: chu 'dzin dang ni @223b bral ba yi //
T02TD1371E:223b-1: nam mkha' dangs par gyur pa la //
T02TD1371E:223b-2: snga dro nyi ma rgyab phyogs te //
T02TD1371E:223b-3: phyi dro yang na de bzhin no //
T02TD1371E:223b-4: nyi phyed mig la gnod phyir spang //
T02TD1371E:223b-5: nam mkha' las byung rang byung ba //
T02TD1371E:223b-6: shes rab ye shes me bo che //
T02TD1371E:223b-7: 'od chen rnam par snang bar byed //
T02TD1371E:223b-8: ye shes snang ba lam me ba //
T02TD1371E:223b-9: 'gro ba'i mar me ye shes sgron //
T02TD1371E:223b-10: gzi brjid chen po 'od gsal ba //
T02TD1371E:223b-11: sngags mchog sngags bdag rig sngags rgyal //
T02TD1371E:223b-12: gsang sngags rgyal po don chen byed //
T02TD1371E:223b-13: ji srid thig le'i nang du ni //
T02TD1371E:223b-14: ri mo nag po skra yi tshad //
T02TD1371E:223b-16: rnal 'byor ba yis thob pa yi //
T02TD1371E:223b-17: so sor sdud pa snyoms 'jug pas //
T02TD1371E:223b-18: sngags rnams thams cad byin gyis brlab //
T02TD1371E:223b-19: shes rab rtog dang dpyod pa dang //
T02TD1371E:223b-20: dga' dang bde ba mi g-yo ba //
T02TD1371E:223b-21: bsam gtan yan lag lnga brtan pas //
T02TD1371E:223b-22: mngon shes lnga thob mi bdag kye //
T02TD1371E:223b-23: bar ma dbugs 'byung mchog yin te //
T02TD1371E:223b-24: bshad gci dang ni zla nyi yi //
T02TD1371E:223b-25: rtsa bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan //
T02TD1371E:223b-26: ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin dbugs //
T02TD1371E:223b-27: 'byung ba lnga yi ngo bo nyid //
T02TD1371E:223b-28: sangs rgyas lnga yis byin gyis brlabs //
T02TD1371E:223b-29: srog dang rtsol ba zhes byar bshad //
T02TD1371E:223b-30: rtag tu 'dzin pa'i stobs kyis ni //
T02TD1371E:223b-31: rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag 'jug //
T02TD1371E:223b-32: lte bar gtum mo sbar ba yis //
T02TD1371E:223b-33: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga bsregs te //
T02TD1371E:223b-34: spyan la sogs pa yang bsregs nas /
T02TD1371E:223b-35: ham bsregs pa las zla rgyun 'bab //
T02TD1371E:223b-36: dam tshig sems dpa' spyod yul can //
T02TD1371E:223b-37: sku mthong nas ni nyin re yis //
T02TD1371E:223b-38: dus su srog gi rlung dag ni //
T02TD1371E:223b-40: bum pa sbyor bas dgang bar bya //
T02TD1371E:223b-41: ji srid du ni 'khor bzhin ma //
T02TD1371E:223b-42: rang gi lus la yongs bskor ba //
T02TD1371E:223b-44: sngon gsungs sku la rang gi yin //
T02TD1371E:223b-45: des ni zla drug reg spangs bde //
T02TD1371E:223b-46: chu nyi lta bur rab snang bar //
T02TD1371E:223b-47: dri ma med par sna tshogs mdog / rnam pa kun du rang gi sems //
T02TD1371E:223b-48: rang gi sems nyid bde ba nyid //
T02TD1371E:223b-50: spyan lnga mngon shes drug 'byung ste //
T02TD1371E:224a-2: ma rig la sogs lugs bzlog pas //
T02TD1371E:224a-3: sa ni bcu gnyis thob 'gyur te //
T02TD1371E:224a-4: rtog pa med pa'i chos can la //
T02TD1371E:224a-5: skad cig gcig la mngon sangs rgyas //
T02TD1371E:224a-6: rdo rje nyi ma snang ba che //
T02TD1371E:224a-7: rdo rje zla ba dri med 'od //
T02TD1371E:224a-8: sa rnams yongs su rdzogs pa yi /
T02TD1371E:224a-9: dngos po gnyis su rab bstan te /
T02TD1371E:224a-10: ye shes yod pa des na de //
T02TD1371E:224a-11: skyob pa ye shes can du brjod //
T02TD1371E:224a-12: dmigs pa med pa snying rje yis //
T02TD1371E:224a-14: yid bzhin nor bu lta bu ni //
T02TD1371E:224a-15: mtha' yas sems can re skor ba'i //
T02TD1371E:224a-16: sems can sgrol ba'i bde ba che //
T02TD1371E:224a-18: 'gro drug sdug bsngal sel byed pa'i //
T02TD1371E:224a-19: lam mchog tshol dang phrad par shog //
T02TD1371E:224a-20: rnal 'byor gsum gyi snying po gsal ba zhes bya ba /
T02TD1371E:224a-21: byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal rgyal po grags par gdul bya la dgongs nas skye ba ba zhes nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD1371E:224a-23: // / pandi ta so ma n'a tha dang /
T02TD1371E:224a-24: lo ts'a ba 'bro shes rab grags kyis bsgyur pa'o//
